title: How can we see a satellite or ISS from the roof of our house? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah absolutely you can see the International Space station (ISS) from the roof of your house but it looks absolutely like STAR.You can check in the NASA web portal: SPOT THE STATION with your location of your city or location.You can also click alert now button for getting a notification to see International space station (ISS) in your city or location
When they are showing it on TV take your TV to your house roof & see it !
